text: "P.Y.T. (Pretty Young Thing)" is a song by American singer, songwriter and dancer Michael Jackson from his 1982 album Thriller. The track was written by Jackson and produced by Quincy Jones. It is an upbeat, funky tune that celebrates youthful love and attraction. The song showcases Jackson's signature vocal style and features vibrant instrumentation, making it a standout track on one of the best-selling albums of all time. The song's catchy chorus and infectious rhythm have made it a staple in Jackson's discography, and it remains a fan favorite. The song has been covered and sampled by various artists over the years, highlighting its lasting impact on pop culture.
title: P.Y.T. (Pretty Young Thing)
